abstract: A Federal Reserve official’s remarks stirred hopes for stimulus, and the European Central Bank kept the door open to making a future cut to its main interest rate.
snippet: A Federal Reserve official’s remarks stirred hopes for stimulus, and the European Central Bank kept the door open to making a future cut to its main interest rate.
lead_paragraph: Stocks surged on Wednesday as remarks from a Federal Reserve official stirred stimulus hopes and after stocks in Europe rose when the European Central Bank kept the door open to making a future cut to its benchmark interest rate.

headline.main: Stocks Jump After Central Bank Officials’ Remarks
headline.print_headline: Central Banks’ Actions Help Buoy Markets
